name: libstokes
body:
### Welcome to libstokes Pages.
[libstokes](http://kichiki.github.com/ryuon/libstokes/) contains functions to solve resistance and mobility problems under the periodic boundary condition with F, FT, and FTS versions for full 3D as well as semi-2D (monolayer) configurations. For each of them, there are two functions, with or without lubrication correction. For mobility problem, also fixed particles can be handled.

### about RYUON project
[libstokes](http://kichiki.github.com/ryuon/libstokes/) is a part of [RYUON project](http://kichiki.github.com/ryuon/).

For details about libstokes, go to "[libstokes](http://kichiki.github.com/ryuon/libstokes/)"

### Authors and Contributors
Kengo Ichiki (@kichiki)

### License
[libstokes](http://kichiki.github.com/ryuon/libstokes/) is released under [GNU General Public License, version 2](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html)
